This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation where concept is-a _ObservationInterpretationSusceptibility

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationInterpretation
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _ObservationInterpretationSusceptibilityObservationInterpretationSusceptibilityInterpretations of anti-microbial susceptibility testing results (microbiology). At most one allowed.

name: ObservationInterpretationSusceptibility
title: ObservationInterpretationSusceptibility
description: Interpretations of anti-microbial susceptibility testing results (microbiology). At most one allowed.
